title: Remove profile picture upload from login screen

requirements.text: Remove the profile picture upload component from the login/profile setup flow in LoginPage.tsx

quotes: قابلیت آپلود عکس پروفایل را حذف کن

acceptanceCriteria: The ProfilePictureUpload component is no longer rendered in LoginPage.tsx
Users can complete login by entering only their display name
No profile picture field is visible during the setup flow

requirements.text: Update the backend createProfile method to accept only displayName without requiring profilePicture
acceptanceCriteria: The createProfile function in main.mo accepts a null or empty profilePicture field
User profiles can be created without a profile picture
Existing profiles with pictures remain unchanged

requirements.text: Update the user profile mutation hook to send null or empty string for profilePicture when creating profiles
acceptanceCriteria: The profile creation mutation in useQueries.ts does not include profilePicture data
Profile creation succeeds without uploading an image

constraints: Do not remove the profilePicture field from existing user profiles in the backend
Preserve the ProfilePictureUpload.tsx component file for potential future use
Maintain compatibility with existing profiles that have profile pictures
nonGoals: Removing profile pictures from the chat interface or user avatars
Deleting existing profile pictures from user accounts
Modifying the profile picture display logic in other components
